src:
Kao u Njukaslu 2003: Divac bodri Partizan na Old Trafordu
Za crno-bele će u Mančesteru navijati i legendarni košarkaš

05 Nov 2019

Nema tog navijača Partizana koji nekoliko puta bar nije odgledao emotivnu scenu sa Sent Džejms Parka iz 2003. godine. Radosni Vlade Divac grli Lotara Mateusa i podiže ga u vazduh. Zatim se zdravi sa igračima crno-belih i od junaka penal serije Ivice Kralja na poklon dobija rukavice.
Jedan od najboljih igrača u istoriji srpske košarke bio je Partizanov talisman u Njukaslu, kada se klub iz Humske prvi put plasirao u Ligu šampiona. Veruju u Partizanu da će se istorija ponoviti i da će na Old Trafordu protiv Mančestera ostvariti pozitivan rezultat. Jer će ih sa tribina Teatra snova bodriti Vlade Divac.
Ova informacija je potvrđena MOZZART Sportu u redovima osvajača Kupa Srbije. Generalni menadžer Sakramenta spoznao je da Partizan igra jednu od najvažnijih utakmica za prolaz grupne faze Lige Evrope, te je odlučio da preleti Atlantik i pruži podršku timu Sava Miloševića. Bez obzira što ima obaveze u redovima Kingsa.
Pored Divca na najatraktivnijem evropskom gostovanju Partizan će bodriti oko 1000 Grobara.
(Foto MN Press)
text:
As in Newcastle 2003: Divas cheer Partizan at Old Traford
The legendary basketball player will be cheering for the black and white in Manchester

05 Nov 2019

There is no Partizan fan who has at least not seen the 2003 St James Park emotional scene. Joyful Vlade Divac hugs Lotar Mateus and raises him into the air. He then gets healthy with black and white players and gets gloves from the hero of the Ivica King penal series.
One of the best players in Serbian basketball history was Partizan's talisman in Newcastle, when the club from Humska first placed in the Champions League. They believe in Partizan that history will repeat itself and that at Old Traford against Manchester it will produce a positive result. Because Vlade Divac will encourage them from the stands of the Theater of Dreams.
This information was confirmed by MOZZART Sport in the ranks of the Serbian Cup Winners. The Sacramento general manager realized that Partizan was playing one of the most important matches for the Europa League group stage, and decided to fly over the Atlantic and support Savo Milosevic's team. No matter what he has obligations in the Kings ranks.
In addition to Divac, Partizan will have around 1000 Grobars on the most attractive European tour.
(Photo by MN Press)
